collection_description.intro_text: The powerhouse of the DLW Linoleum range based on 98% natural ingredients
collection_description.full_text:
Construction:
1. Neocare tm surface treatment
2. Linoleum calendered
3. Jute Backlayer
Product & Design
98% natural ingredients: bright & sparkling colours
Inlaid designs: long lasting aspect
Neocare surface treatment: matt effect
Modern design: fine grain effect
Installation & Maintenance
Neocare surface treatment: easy maintenance and low total cost of ownership
Flexible product: easy to cut and to install
Market Application
Thickness of 4 mm: suitable for mechanical traffic
High abrasion & scratch resisance: designed for industrial areas
Sustainability
98% natural (bio based & mineral) ingredients: organic flooring solution
76% rapidly renewable ingredients: preservation of resources
TVOC after 28 days <50 micrograms/m3: very good indoor air quality
Up to 32% recycled content/100% recyclable: preservation of resources
Made in Germany: reduced CO2 footprint of transport
CO2 neutral from cradle to gate
Cradle to Cradle Silver
